mapper.select: select t.com_id as comId, t.com_name as comName, t.org_code as orgCode, t.business_num as businessNum, t.regis_address as regisAddress, t.com_addres as comAddress, t.legal_perso as legalPerson, t.economic_type as economicType, t.regis_capital as regisCapital, t.skill_leader as skillLeader, t.created, t.updated, t.logo from mishu.`tb_company` t where t.range=#{qua_regex}
select t.com_id as comId,t.range from tb_company t where t.com_name=#{comName}
